review_text: This app is fantastic! The new update made it so much faster and easier to use. I love the dark mode feature.
I used to love this app, but after the last update, it crashes every time I try to open it. So frustrating!
It's an okay app. Does the job but the user interface feels a bit outdated and clunky.
Absolutely brilliant. The best app for productivity. The customer support is also very responsive.
The login process is a nightmare. It keeps asking for authentication and fails half the time. Please fix the login bug.
The performance is really slow on my older phone. It takes ages to load.
The app is good, but payment fails frequently. I tried to subscribe but the payment screen just froze.
I'm not sure what changed, but the app is now draining my battery really fast. Never had this problem before.
A solid application that meets all my needs. The export feature is a lifesaver.
It works as expected. Nothing special, but no major issues either.
Horrible user experience. The buttons are too small and the navigation is confusing. I can never find what I'm looking for.
Five stars! This app has changed the way I organize my work. Simple, intuitive, and powerful.
Why are there so many ads now? It makes the app almost unusable. The payment system to remove them also failed.
It's pretty decent. I use it once a week.
The recent feature addition is exactly what I was looking for. Keep up the great work, team!
Another bug found. The search function returns irrelevant results. The search is completely broken.
